name: Warkey
description:
Story

When The Restless Sonmez herd saw the booty and advanced civilization of the natives of the Kabia world, they began attacking the Kabia people, stealing their money and belongings and harming the natives in Kabia. Thereupon, the people of Kabia summoned the three heroes, the invincibles of the Warkey universe, to help. These three heroes started a long and difficult fight against The Restless Sonmez.

Gameplay

The game starts in a place where NPCs are located. In this location, the player can invite teammates to their own game and change their own character. After interacting with several NPCs, the player chooses what he wants from the given quests and starts the quest. Players are teleported to the map created according to the given task. In this map, the desired stages are carried out and continued. As the stages progress, enemies attack our players and the map gets harder as it reaches the end. During this progression, the player can gain experience points and money from killing enemies. In addition, if the mission is completed successfully, it gains additional experience points and money.

Player Control:

WASD keys to walk.
Mouse movement to look around.
SHIFT key to run.
SPACE key to jump.
Y key to change character. (Only in the camp scene)
F key to collect items on the ground.
E key to interact with NPC.
Scrolling the mouse wheel to change the dialog response.
Mouse left click to attack.
Right mouse click to defend or aim.
1 button health potion.
2 key stamina potion.
3 key increases the character's speed.

Group Members

Manager: Tayyib Bayram
Designer: Erdem Demir
Programmer: Behzat Ardanuc
UI/UX Designer: Mohammed Elazab
